a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of people with depression, by region, 1990 to 2019
Total number of people of all ages, across both sexes with depressive disorders. Figures attempt to provide a true
estimate (going beyond reported diagnosis) of the number of people with depression based on medical,
epidemiological data, surveys and meta-regression modelling.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
